quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an profound round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First step, try to go north. With that accomplished, recover the soap dispenser from the bench within the shower. Then, make an effort to take a trip south. And then, try to head east. With that over with, drop the soap dispenser on the floor of the cellar. Got that? Good!

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cellar.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You are in a sauna. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can see a table. [if there is something on the s_1]On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] You can make out a board. The board is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the board you make out [a list of things on the s_2]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the scullery.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a fridge.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The fridge is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You've stumbled into an usual room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be usual. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the pantry. You begin looking for stuff.

 You can make out a rack. The rack is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_3]. Huh, weird.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a workbench. [if there is something on the s_4]On the workbench you make out [a list of things on the s_4]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]However, the workbench, like an empty workbench, has nothing on it. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You've walked into a typical room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be typical. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the office.

 You can make out a bureau.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The bureau contains [a list of things in the c_1]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The bureau is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You arrive in a basement. An ordinary one.

 You see a stand. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? The stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_5] On the stand you can see [a list of things on the s_5], so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] However, the stand, like an empty stand, has nothing on it. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a shower. A standard kind of place. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a dresser.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_2]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a bench. The bench is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the bench you can see [a list of things on the s_0]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a cookery.

 You can make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] freezer, which looks ordinary, here.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_3]![end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The freezer is empty![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've entered a vault.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You are in a cookhouse. A typical kind of place.



There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: door
infos.desc: it is what it is, a door [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: passageway
infos.desc: The passageway looks ominous. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: hatch
infos.desc: The hatch looks towering. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: gate
infos.desc: The gate looks durable. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: fridge
infos.desc: The fridge looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: bureau
infos.desc: The bureau looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: dresser
infos.desc: The dresser looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: freezer
infos.desc: The freezer looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: apple
infos.desc: The apple looks inviting.

infos.name: cabbage
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that standard thing.

infos.name: bug
infos.desc: The bug is brand new.

infos.name: pair of headphones
infos.desc: The pair of headphones is antiquated.

infos.name: bench
infos.desc: The bench is stable.

infos.name: table
infos.desc: The table is reliable.

infos.name: board
infos.desc: The board is wobbly.

infos.name: rack
infos.desc: The rack is shaky.

infos.name: workbench
infos.desc: The workbench is balanced.

infos.name: stand
infos.desc: The stand is durable.

infos.name: licorice strip
infos.desc: The licorice strip looks appetizing.

infos.name: ladle
infos.desc: The ladle appears to be out of place here

infos.name: novel
infos.desc: The novel is unremarkable.

infos.name: soap dispenser
infos.desc: The soap dispenser is expensive looking.

infos.name: insect
infos.desc: The insect would seem to be out of place here

infos.name: cloak
infos.desc: The cloak is antiquated.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to move north. And then, retrieve the soap dispenser from the bench in the shower. After that, move south. That done, take a trip east. Following that, place the soap dispenser on the floor of the cellar. That's it!
